text:
The post-wedding celebrations for the guests attending Akash Ambani and Shloka Mehta's party turned into a live concert as American rock band Maroon 5 took over the stage.
Agencies
Adam Levine was invited to Mumbai, India for a private performance.
After popular bands and artists including Coldplay singer Chris Martin and The Chainsmokers played that performed at their pre-wedding bash in Switzerland's St Moritz, this comes as another bonus addition for the guests.
Adam Levine was in his full form as he performed an acoustic set at the Jio World Centre in Mumbai last evening.
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
The videos and pictures that made way on the internet have newlyweds Akash and Shloka dancing and lip-syncing as Adam Levine is seen singing "She Will Be Loved".
The post-wedding gig was a star-studded affair with the some of the biggest Bollywood A-listers attending the celebrations to extend their wishes to the couple. Here are a few more pictures that prove that the event was one big Bollywood night! Have a look.
Agencies
Agencies
title: Maroon 5's Adam Levine Performs At Akash Ambani-Shloka Mehta's Post-Wedding Function!
description: Adam Levine was in his full form as he performed an acoustic set at the Jio World Centre in Mumbai last evening. The videos and pictures that made way on the internet have newlyweds Akash and Shloka dancing and lip-syncing as Adam Levine is seen singing "She Will Be Loved".
